subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Advertising and Marketing
Olympic Games
United States Economy
lead_paragraph: While Olympic athletes like Lindsey Vonn and Apolo Ohno will probably have plenty of sponsorship deals, other successful Americans may have a harder time.
